thread.title: The Best Fashion On The Streets Of Amazon India Fashion Week- Autumn Winter, Day 2
thread.title_full: The Best Fashion On The Streets Of Amazon India Fashion Week- Autumn Winter, Day 2

title: The Best Fashion On The Streets Of Amazon India Fashion Week- Autumn Winter, Day 2
text:
facebook 141 SHARES 
Amazon India Fashion Week is a hustle bustle of all things fashionable (obvs! It's see and be seen here). The second day witnessed some wonderful and awe-inspiring collections by the designers, but as always, the streets were where some real trend-spotting happened. From tie-dye suits to huge bags, from fur shoes to velvet caps, the sartorially sound attendees wore everything! So, we made a list of some of our favourite looks we found there. Here's what we saw! 1. A beautiful contrast.
